mapper.insert:
SELECT space_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into space (SPACE_NO, SPACE_CAPACITY, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_ENROLL_DATE, SPACE_MODIFY_DATE, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_CAUTION, SPACE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS, SPACE_INFORMATION, SPACE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_KIND, SPACE_LOCATION, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_ONE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_RESERVATION_STATUS, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_TEL, USER_NO) values(#{space.spaceNo}, #{space.spaceCapacity}, #{space.spacePrice}, current_date, null, #{space.spaceAddress}, #{space.spaceCaution}, #{space.spaceDetailAddress}, 'Y', #{space.spaceInformation}, #{space.spaceIntroduce}, #{space.spaceKind}, #{space.spaceLocation}, #{space.spaceName}, #{space.spaceOneIntroduce}, 'N', #{space.spaceTag}, #{space.spaceTel}, #{userNo})

SELECT file_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into attachment (FILE_NO, CHANGE_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_STATUS, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_LEVEL, SPACE_NO) values(#{fileNo}, #{attachment.changeName}, #{attachment.originName}, #{attachment.filePath}, 'Y', CURRENT_DATE, #{attachment.fileLevel}, #{spaceNo})
mapper.select: SELECT *FROM (SELECT a.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM( SELECT A.SPACE_NO,SPACE_NAME,SPACE_ADDRESS,SPACE_TAG, SPACE_PRICE,SPACE_CAPACITY,FILE_PATH,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME FROM SPACE S JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (S.SPACE_NO=A.SPACE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO=S.USER_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL=1 AND SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS ='Y' AND M.OUT_STATUS='N' ORDER BY SPACE_NO DESC )a) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE S JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO=S.USER_NO) WHERE M.OUT_STATUS='N' AND S.SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS ='Y'

SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_CAPACITY, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_ENROLL_DATE, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_CAUTION, SPACE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, SPACE_INFORMATION, SPACE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_KIND, SPACE_LOCATION, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_ONE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_TEL, USER_NO FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO =#{spaceNo} AND SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS ='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, CHANGE_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE SPACE_NO=#{spaceNo} AND FILE_LEVEL != 1 AND FILE_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE SET SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS ='N' WHERE SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo}
